thread.title: Columbine students walk out of school; 20 years ago, they ran

title: Columbine students walk out of school; 20 years ago, they ran
text:
Columbine students walk out of school; 20 years ago, they ran 4:18pm EDT - 00:38 
For students at Columbine High School in Colorado, Wednesday's National School Walkout protest had particular meaning. It was there, on April 20, 1999, that 12 students and one teacher were murdered by two gun-wielding students who then killed themselves. Rough cut
